E
membranifera Emery.
Literature records:
Norfolk
( Wetterer 2011b ), “

* memorialis
(Deyrup). Chesapeake : Northwest River Park and Campground, 36.58633° N , - 76.16529° W , 20 m , 25.iv.2016 , JB Keiper leg., Winkler litter extraction, mixed mesic forest edge (VMNH).

Until now, this rare species was known only from the type series collected by Mark and Stephen Deyrup at Daniel Boone National Forest, Kentucky , although from a rather different type of habitat ( Deyrup 1998 ). Recently Doug Booher has discovered a single North Carolina specimen among
S. missouriensis
materials at MCZ (D. Booher pers. comm. to K. Ivanov).
